code: import React from'react';import{useAppDispatch,useAppSelector}from'store/hooks/hooks';import{generateCars,setRace}from'store/modules/listReducer';import Button from'../Button/Button';import styles from'./ControlPanelRightAside.module.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ControlPanelRightAside(){const dispatch=useAppDispatch();const{garageList,loading,race}=useAppSelector(state=>state.list);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("aside",{className:styles.aside,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.row,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:styles.title,children:"GARAGE (count: ".concat(garageList.length,")")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.row,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:"Race",isDisable:!!(loading||!!race),functionality:()=>dispatch(setRace('started'))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:"Reset",isDisable:!!(loading||!race),functionality:()=>dispatch(setRace(false))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:"Generate Car",isDisable:!!(loading||race),functionality:()=>dispatch(generateCars(100))})]})]});}export default ControlPanelRightAside;
